forum.content:
Human relationship kinda like a mirror , how others treating you depend how you treated others, but there has exception, I'm always greeting to strangers with a friendly's greeting,

maybe arrogantly and humiliating others is you guys hobbies, I often to face those person cause I looks not a nice person, I don't know why but that's Okay, it make sense,

I don't want to let your negative effecting my positive, just give you a break, let your vision ignore my life, cause we not belong each other for live, like I ignoring your self.

Keeping your attitude and hobbies, and I still remained my kindness, thank you for your teaching me how to live.
forum.title: Thank you for your teaching me how to be a selfish.
